Articles.Content: Anyone know where to pick up an updated copy of RBI Caterpillar tracks or anything like it? There was one hanging around in CurseForge but every set of tracks is buggy or moves too slow, and I can't really find any other versions or alternatives....
Some have been resurrected by lo-fi as part of his wheels and repulsors pack. He's working on the others.

Some have been resurrected by lo-fi as part of his wheels and repulsors pack. He's working on the others.

Yup yup! Linky: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84102-WIP-PARTS-PLUGIN-0-24-2-Kerbal-Foundries-wheels-anti-grav-repulsors-and-tracks

Oh right, that's cool! Thanks a bunch guys!
